term.title: rotational constants

item.text: Coefficients of quantum numbers in the rotational term expression and inversely proportional to the principal moments of inertia. Symbols: A, B, C. A(tilde) = h8π2.c.IA (dimension wavenumber), A = h/8π^2.IA (dimension frequency) where h is the Planck constant and c the speed of light in vacuum.
